full_story: One sunny morning in Bedrock, Fred was at the quarry, excitedly getting ready for the day. “Hey, Dino!” he shouted, petting his playful dinosaur, who wagged his tail like a dog. But Fred's smile faded when he heard the news: Barney had been laid off! “Oh no! My best buddy needs a job!” Fred exclaimed. That afternoon, Fred rushed to tell Barney, “Come work with me at the quarry!” Barney’s eyes sparkled with joy, “Really? That would be so fun!” They hopped in Fred's car, laughing and singing all the way to work. But when they arrived, something surprising happened: Mr. Slate announced that Barney would be promoted to be Fred’s boss! Fred’s face turned blue with jealousy, “But I’ve been here longer!” Wilma, always calm and smart, whispered to Fred, “Remember, it’s great to support your friend.” So, Fred took a deep breath and smiled, “Okay, Barney! Let’s be the best team!” Pebbles cheered, “Yay, Daddy and Uncle Barney!” Dino danced around happily. They worked together, and soon Fred realized that having Barney as a boss wasn’t so bad after all. He learned that friendship and teamwork were more important than being the boss. At the end of the day, as the sun set over Bedrock, Fred and Barney shared a big laugh, knowing they could always count on each other.

global_characters_dict.Dino: Dino is a medium-sized, cartoon dinosaur with a long neck and a friendly look. He has a round, plump body with a long, flexible tail and short limbs. His head is large and elongated with a wide mouth and rounded snout. Dino’s neck is very long and slender. His skin is smooth and bright pink with several dark spots on his back. He has small, round eyes set close together, expressive eyebrows, and two small nostrils near the end of his snout. He also has a pair of small, rounded ears on top of his head and a few thin, black hair strands. His toes and fingers are rounded, and his overall posture is upright and cheerful. Dino is a pink dinosaur with black spots on his back and tail. He wears a light blue collar with a yellow tag. His overall look is playful and cartoonish, matching a pet-like character in a prehistoric setting.
global_characters_dict.Barney: Barney is a short, stout man with a compact, rounded body. He has no beard or mustache. He has a proportionally large head on a short, thick neck and broad shoulders. His limbs are short and thick, particularly his legs, giving him a sturdy appearance. His posture is relaxed with slightly sloped shoulders. He has fair, smooth skin. Barney’s face is rounded with a prominent, bulbous nose and a small chin. He has small, round eyes and thick, short eyebrows. His blonde hair is neatly cut and styled flat against his head. His ears are small and close to the head. He has a wide smile, showcasing evenly spaced teeth. Barney is wearing a sleeveless, brown tunic that is short and rough-edged, tied at the neck with a simple string. The fabric looks coarse and primitive. He is barefoot, and his outfit has a casual, stone-age style.
global_characters_dict.Fred: Fred is a middle-aged man with a large and broad body. He has no beard or mustache. He has a strong, stocky body with broad shoulders and short, thick legs. His head is large in proportion to his body, with a wide jaw and a pronounced chin. He has a round face and a short neck. His skin is light and smooth. His hair is black, thick, and styled with a simple side part. His eyebrows are bold and slightly arched. He has a wide mouth with visible front teeth and a big smile. His ears are medium-sized and stick out slightly. His nose is large and rounded, and his eyes are oval-shaped with small pupils. Fred is wearing a sleeveless, knee-length orange tunic with black spots, made of a rough, stone-age style fabric. He has a blue necktie and is barefoot. His overall style is casual and primitive, matching a prehistoric theme.
global_characters_dict.Slate: Slate is a bald, older man with a short, stout build. He has no beard or mustache. He has a compact, stocky body with short arms and legs and a round torso. His head is large compared to his body, with a pronounced, square jaw and a small chin. His skin is fair and smooth. Slate has a bald head with only a few thin strands of hair at the back. He wears round, black glasses that make his eyes appear larger. His eyebrows are thin and arched, and he has a prominent nose. His ears are medium-sized and stick out slightly. His mouth is wide, often seen smiling and showing his upper teeth. Slate is wearing a sleeveless, olive-green tunic with a jagged hem and a large black necktie. He has round glasses and is barefoot. His outfit is simple and primitive, fitting the stone-age style.
global_characters_dict.Wilma: Wilma is a slender woman with a graceful and elegant appearance. She has a slender body with long arms and legs, and her proportions are tall and elegant. Her shoulders are narrow, and her neck is long and thin. She has a small, oval-shaped face and a pointed chin. Her skin is fair and smooth. Her hair is bright orange, thick, and styled in a high bun with a distinct curl at the front. Her eyebrows are thin and curved, and her eyelashes are short. She has small, round eyes and a small nose. Her lips are red and well-defined. Her ears are small and close to her head. Her fingers are long and slim, and she is always in a graceful, upright posture. Wilma is wearing a one-shoulder, white dress with a jagged hem, made from a simple, stone-age style fabric. She has a chunky white necklace and is barefoot. Her overall look is minimalist and primitive, fitting a prehistoric theme.
global_characters_dict.Pebbles: Pebbles is a small toddler girl with a round face and a playful expression. She has a chubby, short body with a large head compared to her body, short arms and legs, and a visible baby belly. Her posture is relaxed and playful. Pebbles has fair, smooth skin. Her hair is bright orange, thick, and tied up in a high ponytail with a large white bow. She has fine, short eyebrows and long eyelashes. Her eyes are big and round, and her cheeks are full. She has a small, upturned nose and a wide smile, showing her small teeth. Her ears are small and close to her head.  Pebbles is wearing a sleeveless, bright green top with black spots and blue shorts. She has her orange hair tied up with a large white bone-shaped hair accessory. Her style is cute and playful, fitting for a young child in a stone-age setting. She is barefoot.
